title: Lady and the Tramp
short_plot_summary: An upper-class Cocker Spaniel named Lady meets a streetwise mongrel named Tramp, and they embark on a romantic adventure.
explanation: A dog, representing both Lady and Tramp, the main characters of the movie
A plate of spaghetti, symbolizing the iconic scene where Lady and Tramp share a romantic meal
Paw prints, illustrating the adventures and journey Lady and Tramp go on together
A heart with a ribbon, signifying the growing love and bond between Lady and Tramp
A cityscape, representing the urban setting where Lady and Tramp's story takes place
